channel.title: Need help making start point and other stuff on mopar 3.0!
channel.description:
How do I make it so the character starts out in a different place? Also, how do I make it so a menu thing comes up when you log in? :confused:
Nvm about the starting out thing. I figured it out on my own. :D But still... how do i make a menu for when you log in?
